name: Protect the Heart
description:
How to Play

Use your weapon to destroy the enemy's glowing red Heart which is the only place where damage can be dealt. Pickup upgrades to improve your weapons, heart, and dash. Protect your Heart at all costs as a single shot is enough to destroy it and end your round.

How to Win

The player with the most amount of kills after 5 rounds on random maps will win the match.

Controls

WASD / Left Stick - Movement
Mouse / Right Stick - Aim
Left Mouse / Right Bumper - Shoot
Space / Left Bumper - Dash

Tip

You can use Parsec (a free program to share the game with others) to play with your friends over the Internet, Have Fun! :)
